article_title: Facebook's latest app experiment is a 'private space' for couples
article_description: If you have a special someone but don t live with them  you re probably feeling a bit stranded during the COVID 19 pandemic  However  Facebook might have a way to help you stay connected beyond the usual phone calls and video chats  Its experiment oriented NP
